data.comment: The match is underway in Bridgeview.
Ismir Pekmic signals a New York throw-in in Chicago's half.
In the minute 2, Chicago are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
New York's Jared Stroud has run offside.
In Bridgeview a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 5, Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to New York.
New York's Samuel Tetteh breaks free at SeatGeek Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bridgeview.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Chicago's Alvaro Medran misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
In the minute 7, New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Chicago.
Throw-in New York.
In the minute 10, Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
In Bridgeview New York's Tom Barlow is caught offside.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for New York at SeatGeek Stadium.
Ismir Pekmic awards Chicago a goal kick.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Can Chicago capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York's half?
Chicago to take a throw-in in New York territory.
New York drive forward but Tom Barlow is judged offside.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Ismir Pekmic.
In Bridgeview Chicago drive forward through Robert Beric. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Chicago in the half of New York.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Throw-in for Chicago in the half of New York.
In the minute 23, Free kick Chicago.
New York to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
Ismir Pekmic awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Chicago's Przemyslaw Frankowski gets his shot away but it misses the target.
New York have a goal kick.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Chicago at SeatGeek Stadium.
New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jared Stroud gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York.
In the minute 30, Przemyslaw Frankowski for Chicago drives towards goal at SeatGeek Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
In the minute 32, Ismir Pekmic signals a New York throw-in in Chicago's half.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Chicago in the half of New York.
Free kick for Chicago in the half of New York.
Chicago are pushing forward but Robert Beric's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 36, Ismir Pekmic awards New York a goal kick.
Ismir Pekmic awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 38, In Bridgeview a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
Goal! Kyle Duncan gives New York a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 39, Jared Stroud with an assist there.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ismir Pekmic signals a New York throw-in in Chicago's half.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jared Stroud for New York who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Chicago.
At SeatGeek Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Jared Stroud is back on his feet again.
In the minute 45, New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for New York at SeatGeek Stadium.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to Chicago.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
In the minute 50, In Bridgeview a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Robert Beric.
Great play from Boris Sekulic to set up the goal.
In the minute 52, Free kick New York.
Chicago have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
In the minute 54, Chicago surge into the attack at SeatGeek Stadium but Mauricio Pinedaâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bridgeview.
Free kick for Chicago in the half of New York.
In the minute 54, Dru Yearwood (New York) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
New York make their first substitution with Caden Clark replacing Samuel Tetteh.
In the minute 57, New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Ismir Pekmic blows against Chicago's Robert Beric for offside.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Chicago at SeatGeek Stadium.
Corner awarded to New York.
New York have been awarded a corner by Ismir Pekmic.
In the minute 62, Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
New York to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
Throw-in for New York at SeatGeek Stadium.
In the minute 65, Free kick for New York in their own half.
Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Chicago.
In the minute 66, New York have a goal kick.
Chicago are coming forward and Robert Beric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ismir Pekmic awards New York a goal kick.
In the minute 67, New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for New York in the half of Chicago.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
The away team have replaced Dru Yearwood with Cristian Casseres Jr. This is the second substitution made today by Gerhard Struber.
In the minute 71, Chicago have been awarded a corner by Ismir Pekmic.
Przemyslaw Frankowski is on target to give Chicago a 2-1 advantage.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Robert Beric for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
In the minute 78, Brian White is on a sub for Sean Davis for New York.
Marc Rzatkowski is replacing Jared Stroud for the away team.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Chicago.
In the minute 79, Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
At SeatGeek Stadium, Aaron Long has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The home team replace Fabian Herbers with Miguel Navarro.
In the minute 81, New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bridgeview.
Throw-in for Chicago at SeatGeek Stadium.
In the minute 85, Chicago are whistled for offside.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to New York.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for New York in the half of Chicago.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismir Pekmic signals a free kick to Chicago.
Chicago's Alvaro Medran is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to New York.
Jason Pendant of New York gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Chicago at SeatGeek Stadium.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Goal! Brian White levels the match at 2-2.
